title: If Wukong fully mastered Wuju
body:
How broken would Wukong be?

Passive: Stone skin and Double Strike
Q: Crushing Strike- Passively, this ability is reduced by Wukong's auto attacks. When this ability is activated, he becomes untargetable, hits up to four consecutive enemies, reduces armour on the first targeted enemy and had an increased melee auto-attack on the first enemy hit. 
W: Mediation Decoy- Leaves a clone, turns Wukong invisible and allows him to self-heal with increased resists
E: Wuju Nimbus- Passive grants extra AD. Active turns into True Damage but disables double strike passive and targeted dash that can hit multiple enemies.
R: Cyclonic Highlander- Passive reduces the cooldowns of Wukong's basic abilities by 70% for champion takedowns that Wukong participates in. Active gives Uber high move speed, immunity to slows, and knocks up enemies.

replies.body:
{{champion:11}} 
"A true master is an eternal student."

**THIS IS VERY UP AND NOT REPRESENTATIVE OF THE TRUE POWER OF WUJU STYLE!**
Let me school you in the way of the Wuju!

----------------------------------------------

> **Passive- Stone Strikes**
> Innate: Wukong gains 4/6/8 armor and magic resist per enemy champion nearby. This is increased by 25% every time Wukong basic attacks, up to a 100% increase of 8/12/16 armor and magic resist per enemy champion nearby. Upon reaching max stacks, all of Wukong's basic attacks hit twice with the second strike dealing 30/40/50% attack damage and applying on-hit effects. The second strike can also critical strike.
> 
> **Ability 1- Crushing Strike**
> Passive: Basic attacks reduce the cool down of Crushing Strike by 0.6/0.7/0.8/0.9/1 second(s).
> Active: Wukong dashes to the target unit and basic attacks them for 30/60/90/120/150 (+110% AD) physical damage. Wukong then becomes untargetable and deals 55/95/135/175/215 (+100% AD) physical damage to every unit around the target before reappearing back his original target and dealing 50% of this damage to them. The base damage of this ability is increased by 100% against minions and monsters.
> All enemy units hit by this have their armor then reduced by 10/15/20/25/30% for 4 seconds. Minions and monsters instead will simply take 10/15/20/25/30% increased damage for 4 seconds.
> Cost: 45 mana
> Cool Down: 18/16.5/15/13.5/12 seconds
> Range: 350
> AoE Radius: 575
> 
> **Ability 2- Meditating Decoys**
> Active: Wukong teleports to the target location and then creates a clone where he originally was before teleporting. He then also makes three other clones an equal distance away from his original location for him to form a square around the original spot that he teleported from.
> Wukong and all clones made from this ability will then begin to meditate, taking 50/55/60/65/70% reduced damage and healing for 30/55/80/105/130 (+30% AP) health per second, increasing by 1% for every 1% health they are missing. This lasts for up to 4 seconds.
> Wukong can reactivate this ability at any time to turn invisible for 1.5 seconds and leave a clone behind that continues to meditate from Wukong's current health upon reactivating this ability. Once Wukong becomes visible again, all clones deal 25/40/55/70/85 (+20% AP) magic damage around themselves.
> Cost: 55/60/65/70/75 mana
> Cool Down: 30/25/20/15/10 seconds
> Range: 450
> Clone AoE Radius: 200
> 
> **Ability 3- Nimbus Wuju**
> Passive: While this ability is not on cool down, Wukong gains 10% increased attack damage.
> Active: Wukong dashes to the target unit and sends clones at the two enemy units closest to that target, dealing 60/105/150/195/240 (+80% bonus AD) true damage to enemy units hit and applying on-hit effects. For the next 4 seconds, Wukong gains 30/35/40/45/50% attack speed and his basic attacks and abilities deal 10/15/20/25/30 (+10/12.5/15/17.5/20% AD) bonus true damage to enemy units hit.
> Cost: 50/55/60/65/70 mana
> Cool Down: 10/9.5/9/8.5/8 seconds
> Range: 650
> Clone Search AoE Radius: 225
> 
> **Ultimate- High Cyclone**
> Passive: Whenever Wukong kills an enemy champion, reduce the cool down of his abilities by 70% and grant him the passive "I Am The Best!" This buff will cause Wukong to gain 3/4/5 attack damage for every kill he has for the next 5 seconds.
> Active: Wukong begins to spin his staff around himself, dealing 20/110/200 (+120% AD) physical damage per second to enemies hit and knocking them into the air for 1.5 seconds upon initially being hit. While spinning, Wukong gains 25/35/45% movement speed, increasing to 65/75/85% movement speed over the duration, and becomes immune to slows and roots.
> This lasts for 4 seconds, being increased by 1 second whenever Wukong scores a kill or assist during High Cyclone.
> Cost: 100 mana
> Cool Down: 120/105/90 seconds
> Range: 325
